price: 32. Y todos (los hombres) sin excepción comparecerán ante Nos (para ser juzgados).
arabic: وَإِن كُلّٞ لَّمَّا جَمِيعٞ لَّدَيۡنَا مُحۡضَرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-in kullun lammā jamīʿun ladaynā muḥ'ḍarūna
